RelatedSentence: Core machine orders in Japan surged a seasonally adjusted 19.1 % on month in March , the Cabinet Office said today - worth 936.7 billion yen .
On a yearly basis , core machine orders spiked 16.1 % - also blowing past forecasts for an increase of 4.3 % following the 10.8 % gain in the previous month .

If the yen extends fall , it is likely to find support around 102.47 against the U.S dollar and 96.25 against the Australian dollar .

A0: The yen weakened against the other major currencies in early Asian deals on Monday following an unexpected surge in Japan machinery orders in March
